title: Simple Italian sausage lasagne
ingredients: ['450g Italian sausage, casings removed', '570g ricotta cheese', '1 egg, lightly beaten', '1/2 teaspoon dried basil', '1/2 teaspoon dried thyme', '1/2 teaspoon garlic granules', '1/2 teaspoon dried oregano', '225g grated mozzarella cheese, divided', '1 (450g) jar pasta sauce', '12 no-cook lasagne sheets', '4 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese']
